job_history.work_description: Provide strategic human resources guidance and oversight on a wide range of activities in support of assigned line of business. Collaborate with senior leadership teams to influence organizational design, management practices and work environment changes. Lead project teams on end-to-end strategy on human capital initiatives (i.e., retention, rewards and recognition, performance management, etc.).

Provide strategic human resources guidance and oversight on a wide range of activities in support of assigned line of business. Coach and develop managers at all levels on performance management of their employees. Provide expertise in facilitating resolution of complex issues and interpretation of policies.

Coach and develop managers at all levels on performance management of their employees. Provide expertise in facilitating resolution of issues and interpretation of policies. Facilitate virtual presentations for employees and managers in the areas of policy interpretation, recruiting, compensation tools, leaves of absence, etc.

Coach and develop managers at all levels on performance management of their employees. Provide expertise in facilitating resolution of issues and interpretation of policies. Facilitate virtual presentations for employees and managers in the areas of policy interpretation, recruiting, compensation tools, leaves of absence, etc.

Coach and develop managers at all levels on performance management of their employees. Provide expertise in facilitating resolution of issues and interpretation of policies. Facilitate virtual presentations for employees and managers in the areas of policy interpretation, recruiting, compensation tools, leaves of absence, etc.

skills.name: Human Resources
skills.explanation: Over two decades of experience in human resources, providing strategic guidance and oversight, coaching and developing managers, and facilitating resolution of complex issues, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Led project teams on end-to-end strategy on human capital initiatives and collaborated with senior leadership teams to influence organizational design, management practices, and work environment changes, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Performance Management
skills.explanation: Coached and developed managers at all levels on performance management of their employees, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Policy Interpretation
skills.explanation: Provided expertise in facilitating resolution of complex issues and interpretation of policies, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Recruitment
skills.explanation: Facilitated virtual presentations for employees and managers in the areas of recruiting, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Compensation Management
skills.explanation: Facilitated virtual presentations for employees and managers in the areas of compensation tools, suggesting a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Employee Development
skills.explanation: Coached and developed managers at all levels on performance management of their employees, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Organizational Design
skills.explanation: Collaborated with senior leadership teams to influence organizational design, management practices, and work environment changes, suggesting strong proficiency.
